name: Doki Doki Destruction
description:
Two Magical Girls take a final stand against the hordes of destro-bots! With your magic shield and the power of friendship, how long will you hold out?

This is a 2D reverse bullet hell inspired shooter game made for the Mini Game Jam: Anime. Use the mouse to control aiming, hold down the mouse button for continuous fire. Thanks for checking out my game! 

Donations welcome to recoup my Gamemaker Studio license fees, but not required.
